p: Human skin melanocytes (ATCC-PCS-200-012) and melanoma cells (ATCC-HTB-72, designation SK-MEL-28) used in experiment were obtained from American Type Culture Collection and cultured in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2 at 37 °C. Human melanocytes were cultured in medium 254, while melanoma cells were cultured in Eagle’s Minimum Essential Medium (EMEM). All media were supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and antibiotics (50 U/mL penicillin and 50 μg/mL streptomycin). All sterile reagents for cell culture were obtained from Gibco (Grand Island, NY, USA).
